article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Tennessee
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Tennessee.
article.content:
​

Are you interested in selling internationally?

​The U.S. Export Assistance Center can help you:

  • Research new international markets
  • Promote your product or service at trade events around the world
  • Locate qualified international buyers and distributors
  • Receive help through every step of the export process

Call us for help with your international trade questions!

In Tennessee, you'll find us inKnoxville,MemphisandNashville.

The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized Tennessee companies to increase international sales.

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please visit our services page. To learn first-hand how we can help your company grow internationally, click on tell us about you, fill out the form and a trade specialist will contact you.

Tennessee Events

  • Australia Market Brief for Education, Healthcare & Tourism - Sept. 25-26
  • TSBDC Export Boot Camp​
